analysis.description:
UniversalManager.transferAidrop (/unique_chucks/17/0xde871faadf05a39aa3a871525696ff4c87ecd550.sol#324-338) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- share == 0

UniversalManager.transfer (/unique_chucks/17/0xde871faadf05a39aa3a871525696ff4c87ecd550.sol#305-322) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(participants[i],_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0xde871faadf05a39aa3a871525696ff4c87ecd550.sol#317-318)

UniversalManager.transferAidrop (/unique_chucks/17/0xde871faadf05a39aa3a871525696ff4c87ecd550.sol#324-338) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(airdropParticipants[i],share) (/unique_chucks/17/0xde871faadf05a39aa3a871525696ff4c87ecd550.sol)

UniversalManager.transfer has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(participants[i],_amount) (/unique_chucks/17/0xde871faadf05a39aa3a871525696ff4c87ecd550.sol#317-318)

UniversalManager.transferAidrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- share = (airdrop.mul(token.balanceOf(airdropParticipants[i]))).div(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/17/0xde871faadf05a39aa3a871525696ff4c87ecd550.sol#335-338)

UniversalManager.transferAidrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(airdropParticipants[i],share) (/unique_chucks/17/0xde871faadf05a39aa3a871525696ff4c87ecd550.sol)
